name: KRTPluginA
description: The free plugin set from KRT.
author: Jacko

modules.name: A
modules.description:
Plate 18 dB filter. Band pass phased ring mod. Other ins
and outs with different order are available. The ring
modulation is between a low and high pass for a band pass
with harmonics effect.

modules.name: μ
modules.description:
Time dependant caclulus on a summing junction with series
truncation distortion. This is complex to explain. Much
better to listen and fiddle.

modules.name: T
modules.description:
Pitched time stretch and matched trigger sync delay. Spools
and then plays back faster such that the overall waveform
is produced at two different frequencies.

modules.name: L
modules.description:
Synchronized delay with shortening. To synchronize with a
buffer but delayed by a bar or some other timed quantity.

modules.name: ;D
modules.description:
Exponential VCA and future estimator with error? A very
simple utility.

modules.name: R
modules.description: Simple mixer split. Put a signal on another as an insert.

modules.name: Ω
modules.description:
Clock distribution randomizer. Generates a randomish
sequence of length 64 and depending on the left-most
displayed letter outputs a trigger when the clock is high
or low.

modules.name: V
modules.description:
Envelope VCA and CV producer. A bit wierd. An experiment in
module design.

modules.name: F
modules.description:
24 dB morph filter. A 2D interpolation and extrapolation
between 4 classic analytic filter responses of Bessel,
Butterworth, Linkwitz and Legendre. Includes an interpole
distortion effect and morphing to the inverse filter.

modules.name: W
modules.description:
Gate transposer. Kind of a tuning plug-board for gate
triggers.

modules.name: Y
modules.description:
Triple sequencer. Nice but complex to operate. Try the
online help.

modules.name: O
modules.description:
Triple parabolic skew feedback oscillator. An experimental
module.

modules.name: S
modules.description:
Clock to CV generator. Needs MIDI clk, cont, stop and
start. Produces a time based CV.

modules.name: E
modules.description: Simple AR envelope with VCA. Nice. Gained modulation out.

modules.name: X
modules.description:
Oversampled wave-folder. A lot of fizz in such a little
module.

modules.name: M
modules.description:
Emphisis and de-emphisis filter. Default is RIAA and
inverse. This module has large gain. WARNING!

modules.name: Q
modules.description:
Quantum gravimitator. Imitates a coupled gravity quantum
idea. I really shouldn't explain. Just play.

modules.name: C
modules.description:
A set of three attenuverters with mixing. Kind of useful
chainable mixer. Includes LPF per channel.

modules.name: U
modules.description: Sample and hold quantizer. Simple.

modules.name: B
modules.description:
Crossbar performance switch. Remembers internal routing for
performance switching.

modules.name: J
modules.description: All-pass filter and phaser. Has an LFO built-in.

modules.name: K
modules.description: Phase modulation oscillator.

modules.name: H
modules.description:
Base gimpathizer. An organ with phase modulation. Bass how
low can you go?

modules.name: I
modules.description: Clock divider with downbeat extract.

modules.name: G
modules.description: Compressor with control outs. Has a low pass peaking filter.
